revised_title: Fossil Remains of an Unusual Fish-like Animal
tldr: The author examines fossil remains of an unusual fish-like animal, which has characteristics different from any existing fish. The animal had large ribs, a long snout, and conical teeth. The author compares the animal's skeleton to those of other fish and concludes that it is a distinct species from any currently known. The drawings of the bones provide evidence of the animal's growth and structure.
